videoSnippet.title: Anatoly Karpov VS Eugenio Torre 2018! | Tournament of Legends (Platja d'Aro)
videoSnippet.description:
#agadmator Check out Karpov vs Torre 1976, Manilla https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zso1SUl3NlU

vVote for my next big series here https://www.youtube.com/user/AGADMATOR/community

Anatoly Karpov vs Eugenio Torre
Platja d'Aro (2018), June-29 
Bogo Indian Defense (E11)

A small town in Catalonia's beautiful Costa Brava has welcomed four renowned chess players from the past. Anatoly Karpov, Ljubomir Ljubojevic, Anatoly Vaisser and Eugenio Torre are playing a unique rapid and blitz tournament in Platja d'Aro. David Llada sent some very nice pictures from the singular Legends Tournament.

1. d4 Nf6 2. c4 e6 3. Nf3 Bb4 4. Bd2 Qe7 5. g3 Nc6 6. Bg2 Bd2 7. Nbd2 d6 8. O-O a5 9. e4 e5 10. d5 Nb8 11. Ne1 Bg4 12. f3 Bd7 13. Qb3 b6 14. Qc3 h5 15. h4 Na6 16. b3 Nh7 17. f4 Nf6 18. a3 Nc5 19. b4 Na4 20. Qd3 O-O 21. Nef3 Ng4 22. Rac1 Rfe8 23. Ng5 f6 24. Nh3 Qf7 25. Bf3 Qg6 26. f5 Qh6 27. Bg4 hg4 28. Nf2 Qh5 29. Qe2 Rf8 30. Qg4 Qg4 31. Ng4 ab4 32. ab4 Nb2 33. Rf3 Ra2 34. c5 Bb5 35. cd6 cd6 36. Rc2 Ra1 37. Kh2 Nd3 38. Re3 Rfa8 39. Kh3 Rh1 40. Nh2 Raa1 41. Ndf3 Rab1 42. Rd2 Nb4 43. g4 Rhd1 44. Rd1 Rd1 45. Rb3 Bf1 46. Nf1 Rf1 47. Kg2
